concepts.definition: Code for the mechanism by which the exposure agent was exchanged or potentially exchanged by the participants involved in the exposure.

concept.definition: Description: Communication of an agent from a living subject or environmental source to a living subject through indirect contact via oral or nasal inhalation.
Description: Communication of an agent from a living subject or environmental source to a living subject through direct physical contact.
Description: Communication of an agent from a food source to a living subject via oral consumption.
Description: Communication of an agent to a living subject by contact and/or consumption via an aqueous medium

concepts.definition: Description: Communication of an agent from a living subject or environmental source to a living subject through indirect contact via oral or nasal inhalation.
Description: Communication of an agent from a living subject or environmental source to a living subject through direct physical contact.
Description: Communication of an agent from a food source to a living subject via oral consumption.
Description: Communication of an agent to a living subject by contact and/or consumption via an aqueous medium

properties.description: Indicates that the code is abstract - only intended to be used as a selector for other concepts

valueset.name: v3.ExposureMode
valueset.description: Code for the mechanism by which the exposure agent was exchanged or potentially exchanged by the participants involved in the exposure.

allowed_values.description: Code for the mechanism by which the exposure agent was exchanged or potentially exchanged by the participants involved in the exposure.
